title: Home care workers: careers, commitments and motivations
abstract: This paper reports on a small-scale study that investigated the careers, commitments, motivations and attitudes toward training of home care workers in Medway. It also gathered information from home care providers to form a picture of Medway’s home care work force

This paper reports on a small-scale study that investigated the careers, commitments, motivations and attitudes toward training of home care workers in Medway.
